Luxury property with designer renovation in Justice Prime. Engel & Völkers offers this beautiful luxury exterior apartment with four balconies on one of the best streets in the prime area of the Justice neighborhood, featuring three spacious bedrooms, all en suite. This elegant and exclusive property, located on the second floor with an elevator, overlooks one of the best streets in the Justice neighborhood and is situated in a lovely classical building next to Plaza de las Salesas. 

It offers a large and spacious living-dining room with three large windows with balconies and an independent designer kitchen with a fourth balcony, equipped with luxury appliances. The resting area consists of three spacious bedrooms, all en suite with beautiful and very spacious bathrooms, overlooking three landscaped patios—a luxury in the heart of the city! The property features original elements such as fireplaces, carved columns, and woodwork, along with high ceilings. All this is combined with a modern luxury renovation carried out with high-quality materials. 

This property is ideal for anyone looking to live in a luxury residence in the best area of Justice or for investment purposes. Do not hesitate to contact us to visit this exclusive property! Engel & Völkers offers this fantastic property in the central Justice neighborhood, specifically in the Salesas area, one of the most sought-after areas in the heart of the capital. 

This area has a characteristic atmosphere of luxury, chic, and bohemian charm, while also concentrating an exquisite cultural, gastronomic, and fashion offer that is out of the ordinary. Boutiques with an enviable selection of design and quality at mid-high prices, distinguished art galleries and antique shops, charming bookstores, renowned restaurants, as well as new-generation gastro-bars, small cafes, and specialty food shops, including the well-known San Antón market, along with the stunning architectural offering of its buildings, have made the Justice neighborhood one of the most coveted in Madrid, attracting a high socio-cultural audience. 

The Justice district, named after the Court of Justice located in Plaza de París in the Salesas neighborhood, is ideally situated between the noble and prestigious neighborhoods of Recoletos, Salamanca, and Almagro in Chamberí, which have always formed the most elegant and aristocratic belt of the city. Well-connected with excellent public transport, it offers numerous bus lines, as well as access to the nearest metro stations of Alonso Martínez and Colón.

LA CASA Agency Imperial offers this property on Manzanares Street, a location that places us in one of the most traditional and emblematic areas of the capital. This location also brings us to the heart of Madrid Río. Situated on the ground floor, its exterior exposure and high ceilings stand out. It features electric heating and air conditioning. The property has 70 m² of constructed space. It is a concept designed to optimize square meters and open spaces; the entrance leads directly into the living-dining area with kitchen, one bedroom, double-glazed climalit windows (notably featuring effective thermal and acoustic insulation), and a complete bathroom with shower. In short, an excellent opportunity to purchase a very cozy and bright home, in a magnificent location. Located just a few meters from Madrid Río, Parque de Atenas, the Almudena Cathedral, the Royal Basilica of San Francisco el Grande, El Rastro de Madrid, and the Jardín de las Vistillas, among others. It is also close to green areas, parks, and all kinds of services. Just 5 minutes from the historical center of the city, Madrid de los Austrias. At LA CASA Agency, we work to provide our clients with the best properties in Madrid, with specialized teams in each area to offer them the best options to meet their needs. A personalized service, where we pay attention to the details.

Beautiful furnished home next to Plaza de la Luna and Gran Vía in Madrid, a historic neighborhood that captivates both its residents and tourists. Furnished and completely renovated. The property, measuring 80m2 according to the land registry, consists of a living-dining room, a separate kitchen equipped with appliances + ceramic hob, an independent bedroom with a large built-in wardrobe and en-suite bathroom, a second bedroom (currently used as an office), and a small separate toilet. All rooms in the house have windows, as well as heating and cooling air conditioning and beautiful designer furniture. Elegant building without an elevator and with a physical doorman. Excellent transport connections! Metro almost at the door (Callao) and various bus lines, in addition to being very close to Gran Vía and Santo Domingo. FABULOUS AND SPACIOUS EXTERIOR APARTMENT IN CONDE DUQUE! No fees for the buyer. A spacious and bright exterior apartment is for sale in one of the most sought-after areas of central Madrid, on the border of the Malasaña-Universidad and Argüelles-Moncloa neighborhoods, right next to the Conde Duque cultural center, which highlights its unbeatable location in terms of services and public transport. It is exterior and located on a bright fourth floor with an elevator, in a beautiful representative building in the center of Madrid, featuring 4 balconies overlooking the street. It is in good condition and ready to move in, although you can update it and change its layout, turning it into the home of your dreams. The property has 123 m2 of built space, consisting of 4 bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen, one bathroom, and a guest toilet. It includes 3 built-in wardrobes, 4 balconies on the facade, 1 bay window in the master bedroom, and a kitchen equipped with all appliances. The floors are parquet, the windows are wooden with Climalit-type glass, and the ceilings are high. Heating is individual electric with accumulators, and hot water is supplied by a natural gas boiler. Its location is excellent, surrounded by all kinds of essential services and leisure activities. Just a step away from Calle Princesa, Calle San Bernardo, and Plaza de España. With schools nearby, supermarkets, El Corte Inglés, shops of all kinds, great restaurants, a library, museums, theaters, parks, and everything you can imagine. Perfectly connected by public transport, with the metro stations Plaza España, Noviciado, and Ventura Rodríguez just 5 minutes away on foot. Multiple bus lines are also available. Don’t miss this opportunity and come visit! 

About the area and transport: Universidad is a neighborhood belonging to the Centro district of Madrid. Its boundaries are the street of Alberto Aguilera and Carranza to the north; Fuencarral street to the east; Gran Vía street to the south; and Calle Princesa to the west. Also known as the neighborhood of Las Maravillas (named after the Church of Our Lady of Las Maravillas located within it) and colloquially called Malasaña, it offers an alternative atmosphere and numerous venues for nightlife; it is the setting for the “Movida madrileña” that took place in the 1970s and 1980s. It features old buildings and narrow streets. In its central part lies the well-known Plaza del Dos de Mayo, and its main axis is San Bernardo street. The best transport option is the metro (Plaza España, Noviciado, Tribunal, Gran Vía, Callao, Bilbao, San Bernardo, Ventura Rodríguez, and Argüelles).
